review: We purchased the "Wilson Jones Round Ring View Binder, 1.5 Inch, Basic, 362 Series, Customizable, White, (4 Pack) (W70362-34WPP)" to store miscellaneous documents. The binders are of high-quality and are very sturdy!  We love the fact that you can customize the binders by placing "pictures and what not" in the viewing sleeve both on the inside; outside; and Spline of the Wilson Jones Binder. The "EZD Ring" is such a breeze to use! We absolutely recommend this product to any all! Thank you goes to our Trustworthy Amazon.com for selling a high-quality product at an unbeaten price-point!
productTitle: Wilson Jones Round Ring View Binder, 1.5 Inch, Basic, 362 Series, Customizable, White, 4 Pack (W70362-34WPP)
